hjz_zork

Class Room

  • java.lang.Object
    • hjz_zork.Room

  • class Room
extends java.lang.Object
    Class which represents a room in the dungeon.
    Version:
    1.0, 11/15/2016
    Author:
    Hollis Pultz, John Pruchnic, Zachary Zwierko

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      (package private) static class  Room.LockedRoomException
      Exception for attempting to pass into this Room while locked.
      (package private) static class  Room.NoRoomException
      Exception class for when there are no rooms to read from a dungeon (.bork or .zork) file.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private boolean beenHere
      Flag for if the player has been to this Room.

      A HashMap of the item contents of this Room.

      The dungeon associated with this Room.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Room

        Room(java.util.Scanner fin,
     Dungeon dun,
     boolean init)
throws Room.NoRoomException
        Constructor for Room class.
        Parameters:
        fin - The Scanner reader of the dungeon (.bork) file to construct this Room from.
        dun - The Dungeon object associated with this Room.
        init - Flag for if this Room's state should be initialized like new.
        Throws:
        Room.NoRoomException - If there are no rooms to read from the dungeon file.

      • leaveBy

        Room leaveBy(java.lang.String dir)
      throws Room.LockedRoomException
        Leave this Room by a given direction.
        Parameters:
        dir - The direction to leave by.
        Returns:
        The new Room in direction dir if any; null otherwise.
        Throws:
        Room.LockedRoomException - If this Room is locked while attempting to leave.
